title: NUBURU Advances Defense-Tech Transformation with Strategic Acquisitions and 50M Military Deployment
summary: CENTENNIAL, Colo.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--NUBURU, Inc. (NYSE American: BURU), a global leader in high-power blue laser technology, today announced significant progress in its strategic transformation, including developments within its planned Defense & Security Hub and key acquisitions.
